name: Scrub Grass
description: Dry parched earth, with bits of crab grass poking up

name: Factory
css: .tile[data-type='Factory']{ background-color: #660099 ; } .tile[data-type='Factory']::before{ border:1px solid white; background:url('/tiles/Factory.png') repeat; }
daytime_outside_message: The sun gleams off of the metal factory shell.
nighttime_outside_message: The cold moon reflects off of the factory walls.

name: Factory (Inside)
description: The inside of a factory building
css: .tile[data-type='Factory (Inside)']{ background-color: #660099 ; } .tile[data-type='Factory (Inside)']::before{ border:1px solid white; background:url('/tiles/Factory.png') repeat; }
daytime_inside_message: The sun streams through the factory's large windows.
nighttime_inside_message: Very scant light can penetrate the forboding metal walls

name: Faded Road
description: A broken remnant of an old asphalt road
css: .tile[data-type='Faded Road']{ background-color: #DDDDFF ; } .tile[data-type='Faded Road']::before{ border:1px solid white; background:url('/tiles/FadedRoad.png') repeat; }

name: Faded General Store
css: .tile[data-type='Faded General Store']{ background-color: #FFFF55 ; } .tile[data-type='Faded General Store']::before{ border:1px solid white; background:url('/tiles/GeneralStore.png') repeat; }

css: .tile[data-type='Faded General Store']{ background-color: #FFFF55 ; } .tile[data-type='Faded General Store']::before{ border:1px solid white; background:url('/tiles/GeneralStore.png') repeat; }
